text: Ara manusera madhye ke'u ke'u bale, ‘amara allah‌ra upara imana enechi’ [1], kintu allah‌ra pathe yakhana tara nigrhita haya, takhana tara manusera piranake allah‌ra sastira mata ganya kare [2]. Ara apanara rabera kacha theke kono sahayya asale tara balate thake, ‘amara to tomadera sange'i chilama [3].’ Srstikulera antahkarane ya ache, allah‌ ki ta samyaka abagata nana?’
